title: Atlas Labs System
summary: A design-engineering operating system enabling rapid experimentation across a global innovation team.

hero.headline: A design system built to fuel weekly product launches.
hero.subheadline: Mk.01 partnered with Atlas Labs to craft a robust, accessible component library that unifies designers and engineers across six time zones.

outcomes: Component adoption across 12 product squads in three months.
Introduced accessibility governance resulting in WCAG 2.1 AA compliance.

chapters.title: Discovery & Inventory

chapters.title: System Architecture
chapters.description: Implemented token-driven architecture with theorem docs, Figma libraries, and storybook coverage.

chapters.title: Scaling & Enablement
chapters.description: Hosted enablement sessions, built governance dashboards, and shipped automation to flag regressions.
